parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance that you want to query.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name that you want to query.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the GA instance. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
The ICP filing status of the accelerated domain name that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **illegal:** The domain name is illegal.
*   **inactive:** The domain name has not completed ICP filing.
*   **active:** The domain name has a valid ICP filing.
*   **unknown:** The ICP filing status is unknown.
